          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Vad kostar det? (Modul 2 - Safir - CFL)</string>
            <string language="en">What does it cost? (Module 2 - Sapphire - CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was kostet es? (Modul 2 - Saphir - CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que coûte-t-elle ? (Module 2 - Saphir - 
CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que custa? (Módulo 2 - Sapphire - CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa costa? (Modulo 2 - Zaffiro - CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι κοστίζει; (Ενότητα 2 - σάπφειρος - CFL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué cuesta? (Módulo 2 - Zafiro - CFL)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Vad säger du i affären? Vad heter Sveriges städer på svenska? I Modul 2 är det bland annat detta du får lära dig.</string>
            <string language="en">What do you say in the shop? What is the name of Sweden's cities in Swedish? In Module 2, including this, you will learn.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">tid</string>
            <string language="sv">mat</string>
            <string language="sv">Sverige</string>
            <string language="sv">grammatik</string>
            <string language="sv">redovisa</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">time</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">Sweden</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">recognize</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was sagen Sie im System? Was ist der Name 
von Städte Schwedens auf Swedish? In Modul 2, einschließlich 
dieses, erlernen Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que dites-vous dans le système ? Quel est 
le nom des villes de la Suède dans le Suédois ? Dans le module
2, y compris ceci, vous apprendrez.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que você diz na loja? Que é o nome de 
cidades de Sweden no sueco? No módulo 2, including isto, você 
aprenderá.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa dite nel negozio? Che cosa è il 
nome delle città della Svezia nello svedese? In modulo 2, 
compreso questo, imparerete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι λέτε στο κατάστημα; Ποιο είναι το όνομα των 
πόλεων της Σουηδίας σε σουηδικά; Στην ενότητα 2, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου αυτού, θα μάθετε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Qué usted dice en el departamento? ¿Cuál
es el nombre de las ciudades de Suecia en sueco? En el módulo 
2, incluyendo esto, usted aprenderá.</string>
          </description>
